name: Parchin Military Complex
description: Major Iranian military-industrial complex located southeast of Tehran. Used for weapons development, testing, and production. Subject to IAEA scrutiny over suspected nuclear weapons-related high-explosive testing. Struck during Operation Epic Fury on February 28, 2026. IRGC Ground Forces Commande...

name: Konarak Naval Base
description: Iranian Navy (IRIN) base in southeastern Iran on the Gulf of Oman. Key naval facility for operations in the Arabian Sea and Gulf of Oman. Struck during Operation Epic Fury on February 28, 2026, with multiple vessels destroyed at berth.
